title: Athena
description: A serverless interactive query service that allows you to analyze data stored in Amazon S3 using standard SQL. No infrastructure to manage, and you pay only for the queries you run.

title: Data Exchange
description: A service that enables customers to find, subscribe to, and use third-party data in the AWS Cloud. Ideal for businesses needing external data sources for analytics.

title: Elastic MapReduce
description: A managed big data service that supports Apache Hadoop, Spark, Presto, and other frameworks for processing large datasets quickly at scale.

title: Glue
description: A serverless ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) service that automates data preparation and transformation for analytics and machine learning. It includes a Data Catalog for metadata management.

title: Kinesis
description: A real-time data streaming service that collects and processes large-scale streaming data for analytics, machine learning, and monitoring. It includes Kinesis Data Streams, Kinesis Data Firehose, and Kinesis Analytics.

title: Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
description: A fully managed Apache Kafka service for building real-time event-driven applications. Reduces operational overhead for managing Kafka clusters.

title: OpenSearch Service
description: A managed search and analytics service (formerly Amazon Elasticsearch Service) used for log analytics, full-text search, and monitoring.

title: QuickSight
description: A cloud-powered business intelligence (BI) tool that creates interactive dashboards and reports from multiple data sources. Uses machine learning insights for anomaly detection.

title: Redshift
description: A fully managed data warehouse that enables fast querying of large datasets. Uses columnar storage and massively parallel processing (MPP) to deliver high performance.

title: EventBridge
description: A serverless event bus that connects applications using events from AWS services, SaaS applications, or custom sources. Useful for real-time event-driven architectures.

title: Simple Notification Service
description: A publish-subscribe (pub/sub) messaging service for sending notifications via SMS, email, or push messages. Integrates with other AWS services like Lambda and SQS.

title: Simple Queue Service
description: A fully managed message queueing service that enables decoupling of application components for scalability and fault tolerance. Supports Standard (high-throughput) and FIFO (ordered) queues.

title: Step Functions
description: A serverless workflow orchestration service for automating and managing multi-step processes across AWS services using a visual workflow.

title: Connect
description: A cloud-based contact center service that allows businesses to set up customer support operations with AI-driven analytics and voice/chat capabilities.

title: Simple Email Service
description: A scalable email-sending platform for transactional emails, marketing campaigns, and automated notifications. Supports inbound and outbound email processing.

title: Billing Conductor
description: A service that allows organizations to customize and manage billing structures, useful for companies handling multiple accounts.

title: Budgets
description: A tool to set cost and usage limits with alerts when spending exceeds predefined budgets. Helps control AWS costs proactively.

title: Cost and Usage Report
description: Provides detailed AWS billing data, including resource-level spending. Used for financial analysis and chargeback reports.

title: Cost Explorer
description: A visual tool for analyzing AWS costs and usage over time, forecasting spending, and identifying savings opportunities.

title: Marketplace
description: An online store where customers can find, buy, and deploy third-party software solutions optimized for AWS.

title: Batch
description: A managed service for running batch processing jobs at scale. Dynamically provisions compute resources based on workload needs.

title: Elastic Compute Cloud
description: Scalable virtual servers in the cloud. Offers various instance types (On-Demand, Reserved, Spot, Dedicated) to optimize cost and performance.

title: Elastic Beanstalk
description: A PaaS (Platform as a Service) offering that simplifies deploying and scaling web applications. Supports Java, Python, Node.js, PHP, Ruby, and more. AWS Elastic Beanstalk is a service for deploying and scaling web applications and services. Upload your code and Elastic Beanstalk automatically handles the deploymentâ€”from capacity provisioning, load balancing, and auto scaling to application health monitoring.

title: Lightsail
description: A simplified cloud platform offering VPS (Virtual Private Servers) with pre-configured compute, storage, and networking for small applications and websites. It is designed for developers, startups, and small businesses who need a quick and easy way to deploy applications and websites without managing complex cloud infrastructure.

title: Local Zones
description: Extends AWS services closer to end-users for ultra-low latency applications, useful for gaming, media, and real-time processing.

title: Outposts
description: Brings AWS infrastructure on-premises, allowing organizations to run AWS services in their own data centers with full AWS integration.

title: Wavelength
description: Enables ultra-low-latency computing at the network edge by embedding AWS compute infrastructure inside telecom 5G networks.

title: Elastic Container Registry
description: A fully managed Docker container registry that securely stores, manages, and deploys container images.

title: Elastic Container Service
description: A high-performance container orchestration service for running Docker containers. Supports AWS Fargate for serverless execution.

title: Elastic Kubernetes Service
description: A fully managed Kubernetes service that simplifies running containerized applications using Kubernetes.

title: Activate for Startups
description: A program providing AWS credits, training, and support to startups, helping them build and scale on AWS.

title: IQ
description: A marketplace connecting customers with AWS-certified experts for project-based work and consultation.

title: Managed Services
description: A fully managed cloud operations service for enterprises, ensuring security, compliance, and infrastructure management.

title: Support
description: Provides technical assistance and troubleshooting through various support plans (Basic, Developer, Business, Enterprise).

title: Aurora
description: A high-performance, highly available relational database compatible with MySQL and PostgreSQL. Offers up to 5x faster performance than standard databases.

title: DynamoDB
description: A fully managed NoSQL database that offers millisecond latency, built-in security, backup, and automatic scaling. Ideal for web apps, gaming, and IoT.

title: MemoryDB for Redis
description: A managed in-memory database compatible with Redis, offering low-latency and high-throughput performance for caching and real-time applications.

title: Neptune
description: A graph database service optimized for relationships and complex queries. Used in fraud detection, social networks, and recommendation engines.

title: Relational Database Service
description: A managed relational database service supporting MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MariaDB, and Oracle. Handles backup, patching, and scaling automatically.

title: AppConfig
description: A feature of AWS Systems Manager that helps manage application configuration changes while minimizing deployment risks.

title: Command Line Interface
description: A command-line tool for managing AWS services using scripts or commands instead of the AWS Management Console.

title: Cloud9
description: A cloud-based IDE (Integrated Development Environment) for writing, debugging, and running code within a browser.

title: CloudShell
description: A browser-based command-line terminal that provides direct access to AWS services without local setup.

title: CodeArtifact
description: A fully managed artifact repository service that stores and retrieves software packages like Maven, NPM, and PyPI.

title: CodeBuild
description: A fully managed CI/CD service that compiles source code, runs tests, and produces deployable software artifacts.

title: CodeCommit
description: A secure, scalable, and fully managed Git-based source control repository for private projects.

title: CodeDeploy
description: Automates application deployments to EC2, on-premises servers, and Lambda functions with rollback capabilities.

title: CodePipeline
description: A CI/CD service that automates the build, test, and deployment processes for faster software delivery.

title: CodeStar
description: A platform that helps quickly develop, build, and deploy applications in AWS with integrated CI/CD tools.

title: X-Ray
description: A tracing service that helps analyze and debug distributed applications by visualizing service interactions.

title: AppStream
description: A managed service that securely delivers virtualized applications to users through a web browser.

title: WorkSpaces
description: A fully managed Desktop-as-a-Service (DaaS) that provides cloud-based virtual desktops.

title: WorkSpaces Web
description: A secure browser-based access solution for corporate web applications, reducing endpoint risks.

title: Amplify
description: A set of tools and services to build, deploy, and host scalable mobile and web applications. Supports authentication, APIs, and real-time data.

title: AppSync
description: A GraphQL API service that allows applications to retrieve only the necessary data from AWS data sources like DynamoDB and Lambda.

title: Device Farm
description: A testing service that allows developers to test mobile apps on real devices hosted in the AWS cloud.

title: IoT Core
description: A managed cloud platform that connects IoT devices securely and allows them to send data to AWS for analytics and machine learning.

title: IoT Greengrass
description: An edge computing service that allows devices to run AWS Lambda functions, machine learning models, and sync data locally without continuous cloud connectivity.

title: Comprehend
description: A natural language processing (NLP) service that uses AI to analyze text for sentiment, key phrases, and topic detection.

title: Kendra
description: An AI-powered search service that improves information retrieval across documents and databases.

title: Lex
description: A managed chatbot service that uses the same deep learning technology as Alexa to build conversational interfaces.

title: Polly
description: A text-to-speech service that converts written text into lifelike speech, supporting multiple languages and voices.

title: Rekognition
description: A computer vision service that detects objects, faces, text, and inappropriate content in images and videos.

title: SageMaker
description: A fully managed service that allows developers to build, train, and deploy machine learning models at scale.

title: Textract
description: An AI service that automatically extracts text, handwriting, and structured data from documents, such as invoices and forms.

title: Transcribe
description: A speech-to-text service that automatically converts spoken words from audio files into text with timestamps.

title: Translate
description: A real-time language translation service that supports automatic detection and translation between multiple languages.

title: Auto Scaling
description: A service that automatically adjusts compute resources based on demand, ensuring cost efficiency and performance.

title: CloudFormation
description: An infrastructure-as-code (IaC) service that provisions AWS resources using declarative templates.

title: CloudTrail
description: A logging service that tracks API activity and AWS account changes for auditing and security analysis.

title: CloudWatch
description: A monitoring and observability service that collects and visualizes logs, metrics, and alerts for AWS resources.

title: Compute Optimizer
description: A service that analyzes and recommends optimizations for compute resources like EC2, Lambda, and ECS.

title: Config
description: A service that tracks AWS resource configurations and compliance over time, helping with security audits.

title: Control Tower
description: Automates multi-account governance following AWS best practices, simplifying large-scale deployments.

title: Health Dashboard
description: Provides real-time health status of AWS services and personalized impact notifications for your account.

title: Launch Wizard
description: Simplifies deployment of enterprise applications such as SAP and Microsoft SQL Server on AWS.

title: License Manager
description: Helps organizations track, manage, and enforce software licensing policies to prevent overuse or compliance issues.

title: Management Console
description: A web-based interface for accessing and managing AWS services.

title: Organizations
description: A service that enables centralized management of multiple AWS accounts, enforcing policies and consolidated billing.

title: Resource Groups and Tag Editor
description: Helps organize and manage AWS resources using tags, simplifying cost allocation and monitoring.

title: Service Catalog
description: Allows businesses to create and manage approved IT service portfolios, ensuring compliance and consistency.

title: Systems Manager
description: A suite of tools for automating operations, managing infrastructure, and troubleshooting AWS resources.

title: Trusted Advisor
description: Provides real-time recommendations for security, performance, cost optimization, and best practices.

title: Well-Architected Tool
description: Guides businesses in designing secure, high-performing, and cost-efficient cloud architectures.

title: Application Discovery Service
description: Gathers data on on-premises workloads to plan cloud migrations.

title: Application Migration Service
description: Automates the lift-and-shift migration of applications to AWS with minimal downtime.

title: Database Migration Service
description: Moves databases to AWS with near-zero downtime, supporting homogeneous (same DB engine) and heterogeneous (different DB engines migrations.

title: Migration Hub
description: Centralized tool to track, monitor, and manage application migrations across AWS services.

title: Schema Conversion Tool
description: Converts database schemas when moving between different database engines (e.g., Oracle â†’ Aurora).

title: Snow Family
description: Includes AWS Snowcone, Snowball, and Snowmobile for transferring large volumes of data physically when network transfer isn't feasible.

title: Transfer Family
description: Securely transfers files via SFTP, FTPS, and FTP to and from Amazon S3 or EFS.

title: API Gateway
description: Fully managed service for creating, deploying, and managing REST, WebSocket, and HTTP APIs.

title: CloudFront
description: A Content Delivery Network (CDN) that speeds up website access by caching content at AWS edge locations.

title: Direct Connect
description: Establishes a private, dedicated connection from on-premises data centers to AWS for higher performance and security.

title: Global Accelerator
description: Improves application availability and performance by routing traffic through AWS's global network rather than the public internet.

title: Route 53
description: A scalable domain name system (DNS) that routes users to AWS services and other websites efficiently.

title: Virtual Private Cloud
description: Allows users to create isolated private networks within AWS with custom IP addressing and security.

title: VPN
description: Provides secure connectivity between on-premises networks and AWS via Site-to-Site VPN or Client VPN.

title: Artifact
description: Provides access to AWS compliance reports and security documents (SOC, ISO, PCI, etc.).

title: Audit Manager
description: Automates compliance audits by collecting AWS usage data and mapping it to audit standards.

title: Certificate Manager
description: Simplifies the provisioning and management of SSL/TLS certificates for secure communications.

title: CloudHSM
description: A managed hardware security module (HSM) for generating and managing encryption keys.

title: Cognito
description: Provides user authentication, authorization, and user management for web and mobile apps.

title: Detective
description: Helps investigate and analyze potential security threats using machine learning and data visualization.

title: Directory Service
description: Provides Microsoft Active Directory (AD) integration for managing users and permissions in AWS.

title: Firewall Manager
description: Centralized management of AWS WAF, AWS Shield, and network firewalls across multiple accounts.

title: GuardDuty
description: A threat detection service that continuously monitors AWS accounts for malicious activity.

title: Identity and Access Management
description: Manages user roles, permissions, and access controls for AWS resources.

title: IAM Identity Center
description: Provides centralized single sign-on (SSO) access to AWS accounts and applications.

title: Inspector
description: Automated security assessments to detect vulnerabilities and compliance risks in EC2 and container workloads.

title: Key Management Service
description: Securely creates, manages, and controls cryptographic keys for AWS services.

title: Macie
description: Uses machine learning to detect and protect sensitive data (e.g., PII) stored in Amazon S3.

title: Network Firewall
description: A stateful, managed firewall service for inspecting and filtering VPC network traffic.

title: Resource Access Manager
description: Enables organizations to share AWS resources securely across accounts.

title: Secrets Manager
description: Securely stores and rotates database credentials, API keys, and other secrets.

title: Security Hub
description: Aggregates security findings from AWS services and third-party tools to provide compliance insights.

title: Shield
description: A DDoS protection service that safeguards AWS applications from large-scale attacks.

title: Web Application Firewall
description: Protects web applications from common web exploits like SQL injection and cross-site scripting (XSS).

title: Fargate
description: A serverless compute engine for containers, running workloads without managing EC2 instances.

title: Lambda
description: Executes event-driven, serverless functions that automatically scale with demand.

title: Backup
description: Automates backup management across AWS services like EBS, RDS, DynamoDB, and S3.

title: Elastic Block Store
description: Provides persistent block storage for EC2 instances, like an external hard drive.

title: Elastic File System
description: A scalable, fully managed file storage system for Linux-based applications.

title: Elastic Disaster Recovery
description: Helps recover on-premises or AWS workloads in case of outages.

title: FSx
description: Managed file storage for Windows File Server, Lustre, NetApp ONTAP, and OpenZFS.

title: Simple Storage Service
description: Scalable object storage for storing and retrieving data from anywhere.

title: S3 Glacier
description: Low-cost, long-term archival storage with retrieval options from minutes to hours.

title: Storage Gateway
description: A hybrid storage service that connects on-premises environments to AWS cloud storage.
